name: The North
declaringWar:
The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword. 
I, Eddard of the House Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North, sentence you to die.
attacked:
Why is it always the innocents who suffer most, 
when you high lords play your Game of Thrones?
defeated:
I cannot believe it all turned out like this... 
I swear to you, this has never happened to me before... 
this is truly the moment Ned Stark became dead Stark...
hateHello: You've called for me, Lord grmbmblgrm?
Do you have a shred of honor?
tradeRequest: When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies but the pack survives.
uniqueName: Winter starts coming and it don't stop coming.
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Tundra] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Culture] from [Forest] tiles without [Lumber Mill] [in all cities]
[+15]% Strength <when fighting in [Friendly land] tiles>
[+15]% Strength <when fighting in [Tundra] tiles>

name: The Riverlands
declaringWar:
You know what, I'm gonna be completely honest. I'm tired of waiting for some kingdom to kick the shit out of us again. 
Just end it, ok? I can't stand this anymore.
attacked:
A war in the 4iverlands? 
At this time of year? 
At this time of day? 
In this part of the country? 
Localized entirely up my ass?
Incredible 
unprecedented.
defeated: Better a sword than a rope. Do it.
introduction: About time we were invaded again.
neutralHello:
LIFE IS PAIN, I HATE- 
oh hello.
hateHello: You will never know how sick it makes me to see you in this room, cringe player. You will never know how much I despise you
tradeRequest:
Wouldn't it be hilarious if I arrived at your keep via trebuchet next time? 
Like *phweeeww* Straight at the castle walls. Would you like that? 
Because I could do that.
uniques: [+1 Food, -1 Production] from [Farm] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Food] from [Farm] tiles [in all cities] <in [River] tiles>
[+1 Food] from [Marsh] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Gold, +1 Culture] from [Citadel] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Food] [in all cities] <in [River] tiles>
[+10]% [Gold] [in all cities] <in [River] tiles>
[+1] Movement <in [River] tiles> <for [Military] units>

name: The Westerlands
adjective: I'm beginning to think these folk might've found gold somewhere...
declaringWar: I'm in the world a little while longer, to defend the Lannisters, to defend my blood.
attacked: Hmph. Wars swallow gold like a pit in the earth.
defeated: It’s the family name that lives on. It’s all that lives on. Not your honor, not your personal glory, family.
introduction: When soldiers lack discipline, the fault lies with their commander.
neutralHello: The House that puts family first will always defeat the house that puts the whims and wishes of their sons and daughters' first.
hateHello: A lion doesn’t concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.
tradeRequest: You don't need to make formal alliances with people you trust.
uniqueName: The Lion in the jungle shows no shame it shows no pride.
uniques: [+3 Gold, +1 Culture] from [Gold Ore] tiles [in all cities]
Double quantity of [Gold Ore] produced
[+1 Gold] from [Mine] tiles [in all cities]
[-33]% maintenance costs <for [Land] units>
[Gold] cost of purchasing [Land] units [-33]%
[+1 Culture, +1 Happiness, +1 Science] per every [75] [Gold]

name: The Vale
attacked:
The Vale is unsinkable! 
    You can't! 
  Are you mad?! 


 Are you crazy?
introduction: We are the free peoples of the Samnite Federation. Respect our peoples, our land, and it's spirit, and we will get along fine.
neutralHello:
Why did you come here? 
    How could you come to the Vale!? 
Haven't you seen my letters?! 
    Have you no decency? 
 Who are these people? 
     Why would you bring them here into my home?! 
   Do you realize what you've done? 
  Haven't you seen it yourself? 
 The Eyrie is impregnable! 
 No one can harm us up here! 
No one! 
    What do you want!?
hateHello:
I want to see them fly! 
                        Fly out the Moon Door! 
Can we make 
them fly mama?
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Culture, +1 Faith] from [Mountain] tiles [in all cities]
[+25]% Strength for cities
[+50]% Strength for cities <within [1] tiles of a [Mountain]>
No Maintenance costs for improvements in [Hill] tiles
[+10]% [Faith] [in capital] <when not at war>
[+1 Food] from every [{Farm} {Hill}] <when not at war>
uniqueText:
+25 Strength for cities, doubled next to mountains, and +2 [Food], +1 [Culture], +1 [Production] and +1 [Faith] from mountains. 
No maintenance costs for improvements in [Hill]s.

name: The Stormlands
declaringWar:
SURROUNDED BY LANNISTERS! EVERY TIME I CLOSE MY EYES I SEE THEIR BLONDE HAIR AND THEIR SMUG, SATISFIED FACES! 
OUT! OUT, DAMN YOU! 
I'M DONE WITH YOU! 
GO, RUN BACK TO WINTERFELL! I'LL HAVE YOUR HEAD ON A SPIKE!
attacked:
BACKSTABBING DOESN'T PREPARE YOU FOR A FIGHT! 

WINE! 



  WINE! 


          MOOOOOOOOAR WINE!
defeated: GIVE ME SOMETHING FOR THE PAIN AND LET ME DIE!
introduction:
IN MY DREAMS, I KILL HIM EVERY NIGHT. A THOUSAND DEATHS WILL STILL BE LESS THAN HE DESERVES! 
I WAS NEVER SO ALIVE AS WHEN I WAS WINNING THIS THRONE, OR SO DEAD AS NOW THAT I'VE WON IT! 
I THOUGHT BEING KING MEANT I COULD DO WHATEVER I WANTED! 
ALL I WANTED TO DO WAS CRACK SKULLS AND FUCK GIRLS!
neutralHello:
THEY NEVER TELL YOU HOW THEY ALL SHIT THEMSELVES! 
THEY DON'T PUT THAT PART IN THE SONGS!
hateHello:
YOUR MOTHER WAS A DUMB WHORE WITH A FAT ASS 
YOU KNOW THAT?

Free Walls are automatically built in your first four cities. 
All defensive and military buildings are built twice as fast, yield +1 [Culture], and +3xp for new land units. 
Great Generals are earned 33% quicker.
cities: I've run  out of city names

name: The Reach
hateHello:
I wonder if you’re the worst person I’ve ever met? 
At a certain age, It’s hard to recall. 

But the truly vile do stand out through the years.
attacked:
I've known a great number of clever men. 
I've outlived them all. You know how? 
I ignored them.
defeated: Are you going to bring some food or do you mean to starve me to death?
neutralHello:
What is your name again? You look like an angry little boy. 
Do shut up, dear.
introduction: I was told you were drunk, impertinent, and thoroughly debauched. You can imagine my disappointment at finding nothing but a browbeaten bookeeper.
declaringWar: The cheese will be served when I want it served, and I want it served now.
tradeRequest: Put the pen down, dear. We both know you’re not writing anything.

uniqueText:
+15% Growth in all cities. 
On Grassland, Bonus Resources yield +1 [Food] and Luxuries yield +1 [Culture]. 

Farms, Pastures and Plantations add to the yield of adjacent Great Person improvements, which in turn bleed their yields to adjacent farms. 
Gain [Culture] when producting mounted units.

name: Dorne
declaringWar:
Ski-bi dibby dib yo da dub dub
Yo da dub dub
Ski-bi dibby dib yo da dub dub
Yo da dub dub
Ba-da-ba-da-ba-be bop bop bodda bope
Bop ba bodda bope
Be bop ba bodda bope
Bop ba bodda
Ba-da-ba-da-ba-be bop ba bodda bope
attacked: Size does not matter when you're flat on your back.
defeated: Today is not the day I die.
introduction:
If the gods were cruel, they would have made me my mother’s firstborn, 
and Doran her third. 
                I am a bloodthirsty man, you see. 
       But it is me you must contend with now, not my patient, prudent, gouty brother
neutralHello: When It Comes To War, I Fight For Dorne. When It Comes To Love... I Don't Choose Sides.
hateHello: After I turn sad, I grow angry.
tradeRequest: It's a big and beautiful world. Most of us live and die in the same corner where we were born and never get to see any of it. I don’t want to be most of us.
uniques: All newly-trained [Land] units [in all cities] receive the [Unbowed] promotion
Enemy [Wounded] units must spend [1] extra movement points when inside your territory <when above [20] Happiness>
[+1 Production] from [Desert] tiles [in all cities] <when at war>
Each city founded increases culture cost of policies [-67]% less than normal
[-67]% unhappiness from the number of cities
[+1 Culture] from [River] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Happiness] from all [Culture] buildings <when not at war>

name: The Iron Islands
adjective: Genuinely devoid of any redeeming cultural qualities
declaringWar: The choice is yours. Live a thrall or die a king. Do you dare to fly? Unless you take the leap, you’ll never know.
tradeRequest: Kneel. I am your king. I am your god. Worship me, and I will raise you up to be my priest.
defeated:
Yarr Harr fiddly dee, I love- 
        What? 


   We... Lost? 
  Shit, uh... 


Perhaps we can fly. 
 All of us. 
  How will we ever know unless we leap from some tall tower? 
   No man ever truly knows what he can do unless he dares to leap. 
 Y'know, fuck, I was sure we'd be getting outta this one.
introduction: We are the ironborn, and once we were conquerors. Our writ ran everywhere the sound of the waves was heard.
neutralHello:
Godless? Why I am the godliest man ever to raise sail! 
You serve one god, but I have served ten thousand. 
From Ib to Asshai, when men see my sails, they pray.
hateHello: I am the strom. The first storm, and the last.
attacked:
Huh? 
  Well fuck. 

This is embarrassing. 
 Seriously I swear this never happens to me, 
     just... 



          Give me a minute...

[-25]% maintenance costs <for [Naval] units>
All newly-trained [Sword] units [in all coastal cities] receive the [Scourge of the Seas] promotion
All newly-trained [Gunpowder] units [in all coastal cities] receive the [Scourge of the Seas] promotion
[-1 Food] from [Farm] tiles [in all cities]
[-1 Food] from [Plantation] tiles [in all cities]
[1] Movement point cost to embark
Earn [50]% of killed [Naval] unit's [Strength] as [Faith]
Damage is ignored when determining unit Strength <for [Naval] units>
[+25]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <when not at war>
Double quantity of [Iron] produced
cities: some other birdshit covered pebble out in the middle of nowhere

name: The Crownlands
declaringWar: You have threathened the balance of this world, we shall remove you!
defeated: AaAahhahahhrhd NOO NO NO NO PLEAE!
neutralHello: I AM THE GOD OF HELLFIRE
hateHello: IMAGINE DRAG ON THIS DICK ACROSS YOUR MOUTH.
tradeRequest: Dragon these nuts across your mouth

name: Braavos
declaringWar: No, you're not defaulting on your loans.
attacked: This decision has killed you, and your empire. You just can't see it yet.
defeated: It is fine. I die a free man, fortunate for me. As will you, in a couple days, weeks, soon enough. But freedom will never die.
uniques: [+3 Gold] from every [Specialist]
Free [Water Dancer] appears <every [6] turns>

name: Norvos
declaringWar:
Wait. 

Your hair... 

THERE IS NONE!?!  


 You dandy FUCK! 

You just made the biggest mistake of your life.
defeated: I actually hate this. Always have. I don't even know what are god's called.
uniques: [+1 Happiness] from every [Faith]
Free [Bearded Bishop] appears <every [5] turns>

name: Lys
declaringWar:
Woah woah woah, don't look! We have a gift for you! 
Stand still so you can get it between the eyes.
defeated: To the victor go the spoils. Consider yourself blessed.
uniques: [+1 Culture] from every [Happiness]
Free [Sellsail] appears <every [5] turns>

name: The Night's Watch
declaringWar: We warned you. We made this colony and we can unmake it too.
defeated:
I fought. I lost. And now my watch has ended. 
If could go back in time, I pray I would've done it all the same.
uniques: [+3 Production] from all [Walls] buildings
[+1 Production] from [Fort] tiles [in all cities]
New [Scout] units start with [30] Experience [in all cities]
[+300]% Strength for cities

name: Myr
declaringWar: Your time has come. I won't bother explaining it to you.
attacked: What's the meaning of this shit!
defeated:
The only hope of progress and enlightenment in this godforsaken world has today been snuffed out. 

Enjoy the eternal dark age you have damned us all to.
uniques: [+1 Science] from every [Culture]
Free [Myrish Crossbowman] appears <every [5] turns>

name: Pentos
declaringWar: The game was rigged from the start.
attacked: I'm sure you don't really mean that.
defeated: Cant say I'm surprised. It's honestly a blessing that this took so long to happen. To the victor.
uniques: [+1 Gold] from every [Food]
Free [Windblown Mercenary] appears <every [9] turns>
cities: Actually the rest of the continent is empty
